critique: The document is an executive order focused on combating inflation through wage and price controls. It directs the Chairman of the Council on Wage and Price Stability to monitor company pay and price practices, promulgate regulations, and identify non-compliant entities. It also mandates that government contracts include clauses requiring contractors to comply with wage and price standards. The order reflects a strong interventionist approach to economic regulation, centralizing power in the executive branch and federal government to manage inflation.
